page.title: 13GLOUCESTER SPA
page.content: GLOUCESTER SPA WAS OFFICIALLY OPENED ON MAY 1ST,1815 IT WAS OWNED BY WEALTHY SIR JAMES JELF. THE NEW SPA SUFFERED FROM THE COMPETITION OF CHELTENHAM AND JELFS BUSINESS FELL APART IN 1815 AND HE WAS MADE TO RETIRE AS THE MAYOR. BUILDINGS ARE AN IMPORTANT EXAMPLE OF THE CITY'S ARCHITECTURE. GLOUCESTER HAS FEW REGENCY BUILDINGS SO IT IS IMPORTANT THAT THEY ARE SAVED. THAT IS WHY THE SPA WAS CALLED A CONSERVATION AREA. 3-11A SPA RD. IS A COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY BUILT IN 1829 BY JOHN PHILLPOTS AS A SPA HOTEL. THERE IS A PARK IN THE SPA WHICH CONTAINS A WAR MEMORIAL AND AN AVIARY IN THE SUMMER ENTERTAINMENT OFTEN COMES TO THE PARK INCLUDING A FAIR.
